content: bibs are great for keeping baby s outfit clean but getting them on and then getting them to stay put can be something of a challenge this simple little bib is a quick and easy knit and is designed to slip over the head without any ties toggles or buttons to fuss with **difficulty** easy - techniques used knitting in the round decreasing **finished measurements** approximately 7 25 inches wide by 8 5 inches long **materials** lily sugar n cream ombres & prints 100% cotton 95yds/87m per 2oz/57g skein colour playtime 02741 1 skein 1 16 circular us 7 4 5 mm knitting needle 1 pair us 7 4 5 mm needles **gauge** 16 sts/24 row = 4 in stockinette stitch
